snippet: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel met with  Chancellor Angela Merkel in Berlin, amid evidence of a growing rift between the longtime allies.
abstract: Israeli Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu arrives in Germany for consultations with Chancellor Angela Merkel amid evidence of widening rift between longtime allies; complex relationship between Germany and Israel is being tested by growing discord over peace process that has already divided Israel from much of rest of Europe.

byline.original: By NICHOLAS KULISH and CHRIS COTTRELL

lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel met with  Chancellor Angela Merkel in Berlin, amid evidence of a growing rift between the longtime allies.

headline.seo: Peace Process Pulls at Germany-Israel Ties
headline.main: Peace Process Pulls at Germany-Israel Ties
headline.print_headline: Peace Process Pulls at Germany-Israel Ties
